name: Low Power
description:
Stranded on an alien planet.

Surrounded by carnivorous, man eating tofu.

Armed with nothing but high powered, automated killing machines and a deck of weird cards.

Can you defeat the tofu menace?

Will you survive, with LOW POWER?

Controls:

WASD - Pan camera

Space - Advance from BUILD PHASE to COMBAT

Mouse - Place buildings.

Unlock new cards and missions by completing missions.

7 Levels

25 cards (10 initial, 15! to unlock)

5 enemy types

Good luck!

Made for Ludum Dare 39, solo project. Please enjoy the game, thanks for playing!
